title: Most Underused Form of Poultry for Income & Sustainability on the Homestead
itunes:title: Most Underused Form of Poultry for Income & Sustainability on the Homestead
description: Learn about this sustainable form of poultry to use on the homestead and how it's vastly underused today. How to put geese to use on your homestead both to work the land and how to make INCOME from them in multiple ways. Join me and Morgan Gold as we talk about ducks and geese on the homestead for livestock but also as a way to make money. Resources/show notes https://melissaknorris.com/264
